name: api_physics2d_HingeJoint2D
description: Joint that allows a Rigidbody2D object to rotate around a point in space or a point on another object.

properties.name: jointAngle
properties.description: The current joint angle (in degrees) with respect to the reference angle.

properties.name: limits
properties.description: Limit of angular rotation (in degrees) on the joint.

properties.name: limitState
properties.description: Gets the state of the joint limit.

properties.name: motor
properties.description: Parameters for the motor force applied to the joint.

properties.name: referenceAngle
properties.description: The angle (in degrees) referenced between the two bodies used as the constraint for the joint.

properties.name: useConnectedAnchor
properties.description: Controls whether the connected anchor is used or not.

properties.name: useLimits
properties.description: Should limits be placed on the range of rotation?

properties.name: useMotor
properties.description: Should the joint be rotated automatically by a motor torque?

properties.name: GetMotorTorque
properties.description: Gets the motor torque of the joint given the specified timestep.

properties.name: Destroy
properties.description: Removes a GameObject, component, or asset.

properties.name: DestroyImmediate
properties.description: Destroys the specified object immediately. Use with caution and in Edit mode only.

properties.name: DontDestroyOnLoad
properties.description: Do not destroy the target Object when loading a new Scene.

properties.name: FindAnyObjectByType
properties.description: Retrieves any active loaded object of Type type.

properties.name: FindFirstObjectByType
properties.description: Retrieves the first active loaded object of Type type.

properties.name: FindObjectsByType
properties.description: Retrieves a list of all loaded objects of Type type.

properties.name: Instantiate
properties.description: Clones the object original and returns the clone.

properties.name: InstantiateAsync
properties.description: Captures a snapshot of the original object (that must be related to some GameObject) and returns the AsyncInstantiateOperation.
